Polygon encircles Augustus Island while Glottolog coordinate is on Sunday Island. Sunday Island and a few other islands in the Buccaneer archipelago are correct (Bowern 2012) but Augustus Island, a bit too far to the east, is not correct. Thus the Polygon should either be attached to Worora [wra] or removed.
